main event: A report from November 1968 details a UFO sighting in Bronx, New York.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3 to 5 minutes., The objects observed were described as round, white lights with an estimated speed of 1,000 to 2,000 MPH., Witnesses reported that the object moved from east to west, ascending into the northwestern sky., The Department of the Air Force responded to the report but stated they needed additional information for investigation., It was noted that there was no physical evidence left by the phenomenon.
witness description: Mr. John Doe and another adult
